name: Solar System Project (impylukkarila)
description:
I have added three additional planets to my Solar System: Mars, Venus, and Mercury. They are complete with scripts to rotate around the sun, and themselves as well as a spooky horror scifi audio attached to the planets that I found for free online. I know space doesn't have wind but I was more focused on the eeriness it provided. 

Created by Samantha Lukkarila
